BeforeGame.Narration: Our cutest protagonist, the top one otaku☆porter, Bro woke up one day discovered that the world she's familiar with changed quite a lot. She got out and discovered that there is a mysterious sign over her head written“Space Bar * X”. Her boss come in and show her what's going on.

InGame.CharacterB: Wake up kid. You've got deliveries to make.
<size=50>Your KPI is the lowest in the whole company! </size> It's all your fault to drag the company behind Solid Express, sleepy Bro!
InGame.CharacterA: But what the hack is happening there? The road ahead seems to be intertwined with Gravity Space and Dash Space! And wait, why there's a strange sign over me?
InGame.CharacterB: I wonder that also. But it's me that can wonder, not you!
In blue, press SPACE BAR to change the direction of gravity.
